item.title: The Case Of The Missing Cassandra Gossip Packets
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: One of my recent tasks was to automate the creation of multi-region Cassandra clusters. I’m still pretty green with Cassandra but have been having some recent success with creating multi-dc (replication group) clusters inside of a single AWS region. The story that follows summarizes what was a painful few days of debugging….
